alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 10:57PM MST until February 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to 11 AM Friday: Payson 3 to 5 inches Pine-Strawberry 7 to 11 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
